steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"biglr","text":"To purify mCherry-WIPI2d IDR (364-426aa) (available from Addgene), fuse the corresponding coding sequence of WIPI2d  to a N-terminal 6xHis-TEV-mCherry-tag through cloning into a pET-DUET1 vector (available from Addgene). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cerom","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e8tom","text":"After the transformation of the pET-DUET1 vector encoding 6xHis-TEV-mCherry-WIPI2d-IDR in E. coli Rosetta pLysS cells(Novagen Cat# 70956-4), grow cells in 2x Tryptone Yeast extract (TY) medium at   until an OD600 of 0.4 and then continued at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":209,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":196,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":242,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"asl2i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e0svd","text":"Once the cells reach an OD600 of 0.8, induce the protein expression with   isopropyl β-D-1-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG) for   at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":26,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":124,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":129,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8gkde","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":57600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7p3p9","text":"After concentrating the purified protein, aliquot the protein and snap-frozen in liquid nitrogen. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5enh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6uf31","text":"Elute the proteins with SEC buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1jcfn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jm9v","text":"SEC buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6einh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f33si","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":""},"colTitles":["A","B"],"colWidths":[132,86],"data":[["Tris-HCl, pH 7.4","25 mM"],["NaCl","150 mM"],["DTT","1 mM"]],"guid":"8B4A7C2B5D2F4C2DAE5CED018C2E52E8","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Tris-HCl, pH 7.4","25 mM"],["NaCl","150 mM"],["DTT","1 mM"]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b1nah","text":"Pool fractions containing the 6xHis-TEV-mCherry-WIPI2d-IDR, concentrate using a 10 kDa cut-off Amicon filter (Merck Millipore) and load onto a pre-equilibrated S75 Increase 10/300 column (Cytiva). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajsag","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"diptv","text":"Elute the proteins with a stepwise imidazole gradient (30, 75, 100, 150, 225, 300 mM). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eukr5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a0r5","text":"Filter the supernatant through an 0.45 µm filter and load onto a pre-equilibrated 5 ml His-Trap HP column (Cytiva).
